page.title: 15CHRIST THE KING SCHOOL
page.content: This is a Catholic school and was first opened in 1969.The foundation stone was put in by Mgr. Canon T.J.Hughes on September 28 1968.It is a small school with 126 pupils.There used to be seven classes but now there are only four, two junior and two infant classes.There is also quite a large hall.One of the classrooms has been made into a library.There are two cloakrooms, one for the infants and one for the juniors,a big kitchen, a staffroom,and offices for the head master and secretary.There are six teachers one secretary and two cooks.Outside there is an infant playground, a junior playground, a netball court, a football pitch and a car park.
